```{r}
library(changepoint)
library(zoo)
library(tseries)
```



```{r}

wti.ts <- zoo(wti$wti, order.by=as.Date(as.character(wti$day), format='%m/%d/%y')) %>%
  as.ts() %>%
  na.remove()
```

```{r}
cpt.1 = cpt.mean(wti.ts, method="PELT", penalty = "Manual", pen.value = 10000, minseglen = 250)
length(cpt.1@cpts)
plot(cpt.1)
```
